title: Rally | COVID-19 Vaccination in Children with Severe Allergies or Mast Cell Disorder
description: We are recruiting volunteers (ages 5-11) to receive the Pfizer-BioNTech mRNA vaccine against COVID-19. Your child may qualify if they have had a severe allergic reaction or have a mast cell disorder.
